jobs.title: Electrical engineering
jobs.description: An electrician responsible for installing, maintaining and repairing all wirings and lighting systems.

jobs.title: Plumbing
jobs.description: A plumber who will install and repair pipes and fixtures that carry water,gas or other fluids in homes and businesses.

jobs.title: Journalism
jobs.description: One who will research,write,edit and file news stories, features and articles.
